mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.paragraph1: Is creating a healthier society throughout every aspect of life: Personal and Business. We do that by delivering a higher standard in personal training experiences.
mission.paragraph2: Is blending innovative sport science with proven training methods, while providing your team members the space where they can live your company culture.

expectations.title: WHAT TO EXPECT?
expectations.subtitle: How a training session at New Health Society looks like

bullets.bullet1: Park in our private parking spots
bullets.bullet3: Meet your coach at the bar

bullets.bullet2: Pair up with a training partner
bullets.bullet3: Get a quick briefing on today's session

bullets.bullet2: Always supervised by at least one coach
bullets.bullet3: Full-body sessions every day for balanced, consistent progress

bullets.bullet1: Shower with fresh towels provided by New Health Society
bullets.bullet3: Ask your coach any questions about training or nutrition at the bar

clients.subtitle: Leaders from these companies trust our coaching

challenges.title: Most founders & executives recognise themselves here
challenges.subtitle: High demands, long days and little time for yourself? These are the challenges we solve every day.

cards.title: BACK & JOINT PAIN
cards.description: A sedentary lifestyle, stress and poor mobility lead to chronic pain and limit your performance.

cards.title: NO ENERGY DESPITE TRAINING
cards.description: You work out but see no change? Without structure and accountability, progress stalls.

cards.title: NO ROUTINE
cards.description: Meetings, travel, family: your calendar is packed and flexible coaching is missing.

cards.title: GENERIC PROGRAMS
cards.description: Standard fitness concepts don’t match your pace, ambition or lifestyle.

promise.title: We build a personalised roadmap with you
promise.subtitle: A system that takes you to your goal step by step – measurable and predictable.
promise.body: Together we analyse where you stand, remove blockers and design a plan that works in your demanding schedule. Training, nutrition and recovery follow one clear structure.
promise.highlightSubtitle: We stay next to you until you arrive at your destination.
